00148         enum Suboptions {

00150             TKPP_HAS_EXPLICIT_PRIMITIVE_COUNT   = 0x0002,
00151             TKPP_ONE_PRIMITIVE_ONLY             = 0x0004,
00152             TKPP_GLOBAL_QUANTIZATION            = 0x0008,
00153             //break in sequence
00154             TKPP_ZERO_X                         = 0x0100,
